column4: Is there a way to run a windows install under ubuntu to access certain drivers so I don't have to dual boot?
virtualbox allows you to run windows in a VM - side by side with linux  .. on the flip side, andlinux allows you to run ubuntu inside windows, side-by-side
would this allow me to access an unsupported scanner?
assuming you allow the VM direct access to the USB interface, this should be possible, yes
